Sentencas: Clean and efficient utilization of the abundant low concentration coal-bed methane (LC-CBM) via solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) is highly attractive for saving energy and mitigate the emission of greenhouse gases.
Titulo: Enhanced conversion efficiency and coking resistance of solid oxide fuel cells with vertical-microchannel anode fueled in CO2 assisted low-concentration coal-bed methane

Sentencas: However, it still remains a great challenge because of the low conversion efficiency and carbon deposition.
Titulo: Enhanced conversion efficiency and coking resistance of solid oxide fuel cells with vertical-microchannel anode fueled in CO2 assisted low-concentration coal-bed methane

Sentencas: Herein, an improvement strategy is proposed via incorporating dry reforming reaction of CO2 assisted LC-CBM.
Titulo: Enhanced conversion efficiency and coking resistance of solid oxide fuel cells with vertical-microchannel anode fueled in CO2 assisted low-concentration coal-bed methane

Sentencas: By introducing CO2 in LC-CBM, the methane conversion improves significantly.
Titulo: Enhanced conversion efficiency and coking resistance of solid oxide fuel cells with vertical-microchannel anode fueled in CO2 assisted low-concentration coal-bed methane

Sentencas: A maximum methane conversion is achieved by incorporating 5 %CO2 and the value is increased from 31.69% to 50.03%.
Titulo: Enhanced conversion efficiency and coking resistance of solid oxide fuel cells with vertical-microchannel anode fueled in CO2 assisted low-concentration coal-bed methane

Sentencas: Meanwhile, a high CO2 conversion of 74.58% is also achieved.
Titulo: Enhanced conversion efficiency and coking resistance of solid oxide fuel cells with vertical-microchannel anode fueled in CO2 assisted low-concentration coal-bed methane

Sentencas: The maximum power density of the single cell with vertical-microchannel anode fueled with 5 %CO2 in LC-CBM is 1321.5 mW cm(-2) at 800 ?, which is a bit lower than that without CO2 participation.
Titulo: Enhanced conversion efficiency and coking resistance of solid oxide fuel cells with vertical-microchannel anode fueled in CO2 assisted low-concentration coal-bed methane

Sentencas: This is probably ascribed to the open circuit voltage decrease caused by the increased partial pressure of oxygen at anode.
Titulo: Enhanced conversion efficiency and coking resistance of solid oxide fuel cells with vertical-microchannel anode fueled in CO2 assisted low-concentration coal-bed methane

Sentencas: The coking tolerance of the single cell with CO2 participation can be improved owing to the high conversion efficiency, leading to a stable power output performance.
Titulo: Enhanced conversion efficiency and coking resistance of solid oxide fuel cells with vertical-microchannel anode fueled in CO2 assisted low-concentration coal-bed methane

Sentencas: CO2 assisted LC-CBM for SOFCs provides a potential solution for the efficient conversion of the low calorific value fuels.
Titulo: Enhanced conversion efficiency and coking resistance of solid oxide fuel cells with vertical-microchannel anode fueled in CO2 assisted low-concentration coal-bed methane
